about_the_game:
• The Walkthrough with Preview is a step-by-step guidance to play the game with preview images (you will be able to know how to reach the scenes you want faster).
  • The Walkthrough without Preview is a step-by-step guidance to play the game without preview images (it won't spoil the story).
  • After downloading the main game, you'll see the walkthroughs in the game folder. The default location on Windows is: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Summer of Love (Captain Kitty).

content_descriptors.notes: This visual novel contains a lot of sexual scenes. There are many routes. You can have a happy ending (Romance Ending or Harem Ending), a neutral ending (Swinging Ending) or a sad ending (Netorare Ending) depending on how you play.

  • After downloading the main game, you'll see the walkthroughs in the game folder. The default location on Windows is: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Summer of Love (Captain Kitty).
